items.title: Handling of Pretti probe prompts prosecutors to consider resignations
items.description: Federal prosecutors in Minneapolis, deeply frustrated by the response to the shootings of Renée Good and Alex Pretti, have suggested they could resign...

items.title: Sen. Klobuchar announces bid for Minnesota governor, seeks ‘common ground’
items.description: Klobuchar is likely to jump into a race that was upended after Gov. Tim Walz (D) made a surprise announcement this month that he would drop his reelec...

items.title: Friction emerges between Trump and Venezuelan opposition over Machado’s return
items.description: The administration may prefer reliability over democracy in Caracas, worrying advocates for opposition leader María Corina Machado.

items.title: Trump faces fresh MAGA blowback for efforts to ‘de-escalate’ in Minnesota
items.description: The president’s response to widespread public dismay over the shooting death of another Minnesotan has put him in a bind with his own base.

items.title: Top Democratic groups urge party to shed soft-on-crime image, hire police
items.description: The Center for American Progress wants Democrats ‘on their front foot’ talking about crime, an issue where Republicans have long held the advantage.
